problem.markdown:
>>Which districts have a negative Penta 1 to Penta 3 dropout rate? (2 attempts)<<
(x) A. District A-2 and District A-3 ( ) B. District A-1 and District A-2 ( ) C. District A-2 and District A-4 ( ) D. District A-1 and District A-3
[explanation] District A-2 and District A-3 had negative dropout rates. [explanation]

multiplechoiceresponse.label: Which districts have a negative Penta 1 to Penta 3 dropout rate? (2 attempts)

choicegroup.choice: A. District A-2 and District A-3
B. District A-1 and District A-2
C. District A-2 and District A-4
D. District A-1 and District A-3

div.p: District A-2 and District A-3 had negative dropout rates.
